abstract: Bank of America relied on a team of consultants to come up with plans to eliminate 30,000 jobs and cut annual costs by $5 billion.
snippet: Bank of America relied on a team of consultants to come up with plans to eliminate 30,000 jobs and cut annual costs by $5 billion.
lead_paragraph: Tannen Maury/European Pressphoto AgencyA Bank of America branch in Glenview, Ill. On Monday, the bank announced plans to cut jobs and reduce annual costs over the next three years.

headline.main: Outsiders’ Ideas Help Bank of America Cut Jobs and Costs

abstract: General Electric plans to repay the $3 billion investment that Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway made during the financial crisis, along with a $300 million bonus.
snippet: General Electric plans to repay the $3 billion investment that Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway made during the financial crisis, along with a $300 million bonus.
lead_paragraph: Mario Anzuoni/ReutersWarren E. Buffett will get back $3 billion that he invested in General Electric during the financial crisis, plus a $300 million bonus.

headline.main: G.E. Will Pay Back $3 Billion to Buffett

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Ben Protess

abstract: Bank of America bought Merrill Lynch and Barclays bought units of Lehman Brothers, but only one of these deals is looking smart.
snippet: Bank of America bought Merrill Lynch and Barclays bought units of Lehman Brothers, but only one of these deals is looking smart.
lead_paragraph: This is a tale of two deals.

headline.main: The Merrill Lynch and Lehman Deals, 3 Years Later
